sprintTooLong: That sprint is too long (the maximum is one hour).
startSprintDelay2: minute sprint starts in one minute!
sprintIntervalLength: You can only ask for five minute intervals.
usernameInvalid: I'm sorry, but I don't know your NaNoWriMo username. Tell me using `!my name is` :D
noWordsYet: You have not written any words yet.
userNotFound: The username you gave me does not seem to exist :(
userNotStarted: You have not created a project yet!
otherUserNotStarted: has not started their project yet.
somethingWentWrong: I'm afraid something has gone wrong :( Try again later...
NanoOver: NaNoWriMo is over. See you next year! :D
helpMessage:
Hi! My name is Timmy!
Here is my command list:
`!help`: To know my command list.
`!sprint xx`: To start a sprint, where `xx` is the sprint length in minutes.
`!crawl`: Get access to the Crawls.
`!d(x)`: Roll a dice.
`!wordcount`: To know the wordcount to achieve for today.
`!prompt`: To get a random writing prompt.
`!my name is xx`: So I know your NaNoWriMo username (replace xx with the username).
`!my words`: To know how many words you have entered on the NaNoWriMo website.
`!words xx`: Know the wordcount of another NaNoWriMo user (replace xx with their username).
`!cheer`: To cheer you up.
`Who da best?`: To know who's the best :)
I... I think there might be other tricks I know... You'll have to find them! 
 
Enjoy!
